{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = |image1_size = |caption = |caption2 = |pp = |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = Foxconn_U98Z066_(HP) |wikipedia = |brand = Foxconn |model = U98Z066 |submodelappend = |submodel = (HP) |revision = |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = September 18, 2013 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Foxconn_U98Z066_(HP) |sernum = |wlclass = N150 |series = |if = Mini PCIe |if_bus_version = |ifconnector = |formfactor = (half) |vendor_id = 14e4 |device_id = 4727 |subvendor_id = 103c |subdevice_id = 145c |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = QDS-BRCM1050 |icid = |boardid = |ecc_id = |oui = 90:4C:E5 |chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4313; |chip2 = |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = U.FL |antenna = |txchains = 1 |rxchains = 1 |sstreams = 1 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |802.11n = 150 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.4 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = Yes |addchip = |flags = |802dot11_protocols = bgn |accessible_UART = |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 10/01/2009 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |country = China |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== :'''[[HP]]''' SPS # 593836-001, AS # 593732-001 "5400012887-02L2 Sample Only PVT Config 110" is printed on the device label. :The model is stated as '''BCM94313HMG2LP1'''. The is no FCC ID on the label, however, silkscreened text on the back of the card indicates this is a BCM94313HMG2L. ===lspci -nnv dump=== 
05:00.0 Network controller [0280]: Broadcom Corporation BCM4313 802.11bgn Wireless Network Adapter [14e4:4727] (rev 01)
        Subsystem: Hewlett-Packard Company Device [103c:145c]
        Physical Slot: 1
        Flags: bus master, fast devsel, latency 0, IRQ 19
        Memory at f1d00000 (64-bit, non-prefetchable) [size=16K]
        Capabilities: [40] Power Management version 3
        Capabilities: [58] Vendor Specific Information: Len=78 
        Capabilities: [48] MSI: Enable- Count=1/1 Maskable- 64bit+
        Capabilities: [d0] Express Endpoint, MSI 00
        Capabilities: [100] Advanced Error Reporting
        Capabilities: [13c] Virtual Channel
        Capabilities: [160] Device Serial Number 00-00-e5-ff-ff-ad-90-4c
        Capabilities: [16c] Power Budgeting 
        Kernel driver in use: bcma-pci-bridge
===ssb + b43 info dump=== 
[115945.315871] bcma-pci-bridge 0000:05:00.0: enabling device (0000 -> 0002)
[115945.315948] bcma: bus2: Found chip with id 0x4313, rev 0x01 and package 0x08
[115945.315980] bcma: bus2: Core 0 found: ChipCommon (manuf 0x4BF, id 0x800, rev 0x24, class 0x0)
[115945.316006] bcma: bus2: Core 1 found: IEEE 802.11 (manuf 0x4BF, id 0x812, rev 0x18, class 0x0)
[115945.316058] bcma: bus2: Core 2 found: PCIe (manuf 0x4BF, id 0x820, rev 0x11, class 0x0)
[115945.328824] b43-phy32: Broadcom 4313 WLAN found (core revision 24)
[115945.329635] b43-phy32 ERROR: FOUND UNSUPPORTED PHY (Analog 10, Type 8 (LCN), Revision 1)
[115945.329642] b43: probe of bcma2:0 failed with error -95
